storyInfo: With his friends' help, Bison enjoys a busy but fulfilling day.

attributes.content: Butler, you're taking your annual leave tomorrow. You should go home early and get some rest.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Please do not worry, Young Master. I am on the last of my tasks for the day, and shall be finished in no time.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: More importantly, why are you up so late at night? You've worked overtime for days now. You need to rest when you can as well.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: I was planning to, but... Father has been trying to expand his business in Columbia.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And I think... I should make an effort to do something ahead of time too, to work with him.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: As I recall, he merely brought it up as an aside at the dinner table.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: If I wait for him to tell me formally, there'll be basically nothing left for me to do.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: *sigh*... You really have it too rough.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: It'll be worth it, if it means I can take over for my father in the future.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Goodness, look at the time. Bison, what are you talking to Butler about?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Nothing, Father. We were just discussing holiday plans.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sir, has the young master told you his?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Not a peep. He's been so busy lately I haven't even seen him much. So, any big plans, Bison?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Um... I want to learn something new. Or start preparing for my projects next year. I haven't thought it through yet, but I need to find something to do.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But it's a holiday...
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Bison, if you really must keep yourself busy, why don't you go see your friends at Penguin Logistics? I brought a lot of things back from Columbia. Bring them something as a present.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Alright. Of course, Father.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Great. Now get some rest. You've got an early day tomorrow, and Butler won't be here to help you. You'll need to prepare the presents yourself.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Yeah, I know. I can handle it on my own.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I can stay to help you wrap your presents before I take my leave, if you like.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: No no no. You should head home and spend time with your family. You've worked so hard this whole year; you don't have to work overtime for me.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Besides... I'm sure Father is expecting more from me than just going to see some friends.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I've known the girls at Penguin Logistics for a while now. Sometimes I forget they're actually our business partners.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I think what he's trying to tell me is that relationships need to be maintained over the long-term, and that the work doesn't end just because we're friends now. I need to remember that.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Butler?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh, nothing. I was just thinking back to when the lady of the house was still with us.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Exusiai, we're going on a picnic. What do you need all those guns for?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Because you never know if you'll be served a butter sandwich or a special surprise!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ugh, so heavy...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Croissant, why are you bringing all that food? Again, we're going on a picnic! We can't eat all that!
attributes.name: Sora
Croissant
attributes.content: No can do... It's sunny out. There's gotta be loads of other folks out picnickin'.

attributes.name: Croissant
attributes.content: Ain't no way... I'm missing... a business opportunity.
attributes.joined: No can do... It's sunny out. There's gotta be loads of other folks out picnickin'.Ain't no way... I'm missing... a business opportunity.

attributes.content: Texas, can you help me out here?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, I tried. She wouldn't listen.
attributes.name: Texas
Croissant
attributes.content: You know me. So long as there's money in it...

attributes.name: Croissant
attributes.content: Nothing's... too heavy... for yer gal Croissant... Ugh!
attributes.joined: You know me. So long as there's money in it...Nothing's... too heavy... for yer gal Croissant... Ugh!

attributes.content: (Holy cow...)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey Bison. What are you doing here today?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hello. Happy New Year.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I brought you girls some presents. I hope you like them.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Wow, what a pretty lamp.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh, Bison? Hehe, since yer here, why doncha come picnickin' with us?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hah, you just want someone to haul your wares.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: *cough* I appreciate the invitation, but I'm just stopping by to say hello, since I have some free time over the holidays.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But you've been so busy lately, and it's been so long since we've seen each other. Has it been that hectic at work?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Actually, we've already got everything sorted out. But I didn't want to slack off just because of the holiday.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I thought slacking off was the whole point of a holiday?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Right, right. And I got us this really pretty new picnic blanket just for this! Come on, Bison!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But I—
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hello, how may I help you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Okay... I don't quite understand, but no problem. We'll take care of it. Yeah, okay. Bye.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Who was that?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The boss. The situation's changed. Looks like we'll have to cancel the picnic.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No way, don't tell me...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yup, sounds like we got that special surprise.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Anyway, I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but we officially have an urgent request on our hands.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No—!
attributes.name: Sora & Exusiai & Croissant

attributes.content: Huddle up. I have something to say.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sheesh, why so mysterious?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Their conversation is really heating up... I guess this is my cue to leave.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Um, if you girls are busy, I think I'll be heading out.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Wait, Bison.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We need you for this job.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes, you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: First, go buy a CD at this record shop?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Er... Wouldn't Sora be a better pick for this? I don't know much about music.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Excuse me, do you carry any—
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Shh... Quiet, kid. We're all listening to our grooves here. Take whatever you want from the shelves. We have everything.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Any recommendations?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Most folks who come here don't need any. Just pick what you want, kid.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'm an adult...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Good. Then you can head on over there, too.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: What's in there?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Okay... sorry.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: He put the headphones on.
Really? Great. I knew it.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: That's my favorite shop. The owner never bothers you with sales pitches or questions. He just leaves you alone and lets you find what you like in his massive collection.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Sometimes, when I'm getting stressed out from my performances, I stop by there to relax.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Sounds like a good place to catch a breather.
Trust me. He'll be absolutely relaxed in there.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Hold up...
What's wrong?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: He set the headphones down.
Are you okay, sir?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh... Apparently I have way too many CDs in stock.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: That mountain of them was an accident waiting to happen. I wouldn't have gone near it, if I were you. How long have you been piling up CDs there?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: A year? Two? It's been too long... Couldn't be bothered to clean it up.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Sounds like you need someone to help you sort them out.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...I guess so?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (This must be what they wanted me to help out with... Sheesh... they could've been clearer with the job description.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (I don't mind listening to music... but now's not the time.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Let me take care of it. I used to be a mail sorter, and I've sorted things much more complicated than these CDs.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Kid, you...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Trust me. I'm a professional.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Uh... hold up, how are you gonna sort them?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: What's going on inside the store? Hello? Hello?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: ...The pile of CDs came crashing down. He's helping clean them up.
What about the music? Is he not listening to music?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: He's going all-out with it. Music's probably the last thing on his mind.
Ugh... my shoulders hurt. I didn't expect him to have so many CDs.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I think I did pretty well with the sorting, though. It's been a long time, but I've still got it.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Let's see, what's my next job... Haggle the price down like mad at this weapon shop?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Why did they give me this one? Croissant seems like she'd be much better at this.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: How'd it go? He inside?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Yeah.
Heh, last time I drove the price down so much they blacklisted me and don't let me in no more. But heck, ain't no skin off my back. I got other ways.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: I'm not so sure this is what the client had in mind.
Aww, you don't think hagglin' helps ya relax? You rack yer brains to argue with the shopkeep and snatch victory in the end. It's a real thrill.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Just trust me. He's gonna be feelin' mighty relaxed, after this.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Heh, I sure hope so. That'd get this over with quickly.
What are you buying, kiddo?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hold on. I have a shopping list.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hmm... Hoo. That's quite a long list.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'll need one of everything on here. I'll take them as soon as you have everything packed and ready. Thanks.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Alright. Here's the invoice. 160 grand in total. Cash or card?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: (That's pretty reasonable... Do I really have to haggle this down?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Oh well... It's what the job calls for.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Do you think you could you give me a discount?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: No can do, kiddo. We're already known for our low prices around here.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Never mind, then. I'll go to another store.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Tsk, fine. You're buying in bulk. I'll give you 10% off.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: (10%... Is that 'mad' enough?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I'm selling them at cost already. Don't push it.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: (I'm not the best at business negotiation, but maybe I could try to put what little I know into haggling.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Come on, let's be honest here. This is nowhere close to cutting into your bottom line.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And what would you know, punk? All these parts are imported straight from Columbia.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sure, they have stickers from Columbian brands, but the manufacturing immediately gives it away that they were made in Bolívar.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The prices you're asking are way above the actual cost. By my estimate, these things are worth no more than 60 thousand LMD.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Beastshit. I sell the real deal here!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: You're sure?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Then you were probably scammed when you ordered them. My family's logistics network has been delivering for this company for years. I remember every lot, every model, and every manufacturing plant of theirs.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You shouldn't trust just anyone. You can't do business that way.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You calling me stupid?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I mean, the other possibility is that you're not stupid, but actually pretty smart. After all, there's a huge difference in price between knockoffs and the genuine article.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: 80 thousand. You'll be earning more than a fair profit, after expenses.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's just cruel...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Please don't cry.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: *sobs*... Too cruel.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Someone just stepped out.
Hah, and I bet that someone's stress-free and fulla confidence, pride, and a whole lotta parts.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: No, it's the shopkeeper.
He ran out of the store crying.
...What?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: I gotta say, what's with the crazy schemes you two came up with?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: You want him relaxed and destressed? You just gotta par-tay! There's no easier way than partying hard!
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Sorry, could you repeat that? This crowd's pretty noisy.
I SAID. HAVING HIM GO TO A PARTY IS THE BEST WAY FOR HIM TO DESTRESS!!
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Ugh... Now you're being loud.
You're at the biggest party in Lungmen on New Year's Eve! I was worried you couldn't hear me.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: What's the matter? Is he there?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: (I wonder if I could've haggled for an even lower price...)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Looks like I still have a ways to go to when it comes to negotiation.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oof! S-So many people.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (I still have one last task to do... Deliver a present to somebody at this party.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But there are so many people here. How am I supposed to find them?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (They're wearing an iron mask and a menacing cape, both impervious to all kinds of weapons... This isn't a character from a kung fu novel, is it?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: *sigh*... A Messenger's job is to brave difficulties. I can do this.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: He's pushing into the crowd. You sure he's not going to find anyone matching that description?
Of course not! I took it straight from a novel I used to read, The Iron Swordsman. What are the odds someone would be cosplaying as him on New Year's Eve?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Not like it's Sauin.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: ...They aren't pulling my leg, are they? Who would dress up like that in this crowd?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Maybe I should go back and double-check with them.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: No way?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: They weren't lying! He's really here!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sir? Sir! Please stop.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm? Who are you?
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Hello, sir. I'm a Messenger. I have a package for you. Please sign for it.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Interesting. A package for me, delivered to this place?
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Right. They had me look for the recipient in the middle of such a big party. I almost thought there had to be a misunderstanding. But thank goodness I found you.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Please go over the contents and sign for it.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I wonder what it is. Never expected to get a package while I'm out of town. What delivery company do you work—
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: (*gulp*)
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Clenches fist)
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Shudders)
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Too bad... He found someone that fit the description.
What? No way!
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: There's a Kazimierzian knight in the crowd.
...What? How's that possible?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: What did you put in the package? The guy looked like he saw a ghost the moment he opened it.
Hmm... I don't really remember. I just grabbed whatever and stuffed it in there.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Let me see... Looks like Croissant ordered a bunch of special arrowheads, so I grabbed one.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: (Good thing there are bushes here...)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Weird... I saw the kid heading this way... but I don't see him anywhere...
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Shit... Where'd he go?
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: What did I even do? And how did the Armorless Union find me all the way out here in Lungmen...?
attributes.name: Armor-clad Knight

attributes.content: Phew... Is he gone?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Why did he attack all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Oh well. Never mind. I finally lost him...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I'm exhausted... I-I need to find a place to catch a breather.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Bison leans against a tree and thinks about everything that has happened today, in an attempt to come up with anything that could explain this absurd turn of events.
But right now, he isn't very keen on thinking too hard.
Perhaps the chilly New Year's Eve breeze has left his mind completely blank.
Perhaps the strange events that unfolded throughout the day have numbed his thought process.
Or perhaps... he simply doesn't want to think, and just wants to lean against the tree.
That is, until a ball comes tumbling toward his feet, rousing him from his daze.
Hey, buddy. Kick the ball back over here, will you?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hello? What're you blanking out for? Wanna join us?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: There are no goals here, and barely any grass... How would we even play?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You just play.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: But there are no lines on the ground. How do we keep score? How do we determine if anyone's breaking the rules?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Rules? We don't care about rules.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Bison suddenly recalls that it's been a very long time since he played football.
His father forced him to join the family business before he had even graduated. And he had to sacrifice a lot for it.
He lifts his head up and gazes at the child in the distance waiting for him to kick the ball back.
They have no grass field to play on, but a dirt pit is more than enough.
They have no goals, but a couple of tin cans will do the trick.
They kick erratically, and their play is all over the place, but what does it matter as long as it's fun?
Bison suddenly realizes that it has been a very long time since he last did anything just for fun.
Pffhaha––
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Is this the answer? The answer to everything?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Never mind. It doesn't matter. I've got something more important to deal with.)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hey, count me in!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Then kick the ball back over here!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Kid, I used to be my school's ace player. Are you sure you can catch it?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: In the end, he's still a kid...
Hey! How come it took you so long to say anything? What's he doing?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Alright, our job here is done.
I'm heading back.
Hey, you're the only one there. Tell us what's going on! Hey!
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: I'll see you later. I need to report to the client.
Hey—
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Mr. Eurill, you sure gave us a difficult problem.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Still, we managed to successfully finish the job.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So he's playing football, huh?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: It's been years since he played. And with a couple of kids not much younger than him. Haha.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I know, I know. He's still a child... Thank you for your work, ladies. I will come visit and bring all of you gifts in due time.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: ...Why didn't I tell him myself?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Good question... I wish I could've.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Alas, I couldn't...
attributes.name: Eurill
